data.text:
@mindingottawa @catsa_gc Bull Shit never cost them anything !
It cost the Taxpayers !!!

@mindingottawa @catsa_gc This is only because they didn't cut staff or hours at all even as flights dropped 90pct.

Any business would have had to.  Govt operations just keep spending
@mindingottawa @catsa_gc The Trudeau Hookup .. it is a thing?
